titles.title: Early Detection of Dyslexia in Children Act of 2009
To require the Secretary of Education to conduct a study and submit to Congress a report on methods for identifying and treating children with dyslexia in kindergarten through third grade.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

bill.summary:
1/6/2009--Introduced.
Early Detection of Dyslexia in Children Act of 2009 - Directs the Secretary of Education to study and report to Congress on methods for identifying and treating children with dyslexia in kindergarten through third grade.
